chapter.title: Command Line Tools
chapter.para: In this chapter we describe how Wolframe functions can be called from command line. The programs introduced here are installed as executables together with the wolframe application server.

sect1.title: The program wolfilter
sect1.para: The program wolfilter allows you to call any Wolframe function or filter on command line. The idea is to provide a tool that allows testing of Wolframe functions without the client server context.

sect1.title: The program wolfwizard
sect1.para: The program wolfwizard allows you to get the configured artefacts of an application as XML. This allows you to visualize the context of an application for example with XSLT or CSS.
